survey_name: Let us know more about you

survey_questions.question: 5. Have you participated in any MOOCs (e.g. courses on Coursera, edX, Udacity etc.) before?
options: I have registered for at least one MOOC, but have not actively participated beyond the first week.
I have participated in at least one MOOC beyond the first week; however, I have not gained any MOOC certificates.
I have gained at least one MOOC certificate.

survey_questions.question: 6. When you try to study, you OFTEN find that...
… you are easily distracted by non-study related thoughts.
… you are easily distracted by external stimuli (e.g. voices, noise, movements, etc.) around you
… you have to work longer than you had planned, or you won’t complete your plan.
7. How many minutes at a time are you able to focus on a study task before you are distracted (e.g. by checking your emails, talking to others, ...)?
